dmca.title: Legal - Copyright Violation - pinoymovie.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: ric lim [mailto:rlim@regalfilms.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2007 7:39 PM
To: zzzzzz
Subject: Legal - Copyright Violation - pinoymovie.com
Importance: High

 

theplanet.com
Attn: Legal Dept.  

 

             Re:       www.pinoymovie.com 

 

Dear Sir:

 

            I am writing on behalf of Regal Entertainment, Inc. ("Regal"), the
holder of certain exclusive rights in federally-registered copyrighted
materials.  This letter shall serve as a "take down" notification
pursuant to Section 512(c)(3) of the Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
